description.value:
Performers, musicians, and explorers. Bards use magic, martial skill, and inspiring performances to support the other members of the party.

This version of the bard class follows the baseline 5e concept closely, but we gave abilities quality of life improvements, replaced the 20th level ability, and allowed bards to integrate musical performance with their spellcasting. Existing 5e subclasses will all work mechanically with this form of the bard class. Click @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.JournalEntry.VLxJ80DY7q7hkXU7.JournalEntryPage.QjLATbZ1uI3tAwjs#bard]{here} for a summary of changes.

Level 1 Bards

When you create a level 1 Bard, you will need to manually add your ability scores. You will gain the rest of the following automatically:

Recommended Ability Scores

You can take one of these recommended ability score arrays, or you can roll or assign them yourself. You can switch any two ability scores, but you do not add any further bonuses (they're already included).

&reference[Strength]: 8 &reference[Dexterity]: 16 &reference[Constitution]: 14 &reference[Intelligence]: 10 &reference[Wisdom]: 10 &reference[Charisma]: 16

or

Strength: 8 Dexterity: 14 Constitution: 14 Intelligence: 12 Wisdom: 12 Charisma: 16

Feat

You gain a level 1 @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.JournalEntry.lGAvinVvDjAXzQ1Q]{feat} of your choice. You can choose from the feats available to all classes or choose a level 1 class-specific feat, if there is one available.

Hit Points

Hit Points at 1st Level: 8 + Constitution Modifier
Hit Points at Higher Levels: 1d8 (or 5) + Constitution Modifier
Hit Dice: 1d8 per bard level

Proficiencies

@UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.JournalEntry.q10XUuFrVlw8qYj1]{Armor}: @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.JournalEntry.q10XUuFrVlw8qYj1.JournalEntryPage.4ZoOlPhNDk46Vvnr]{Light Armor}

@UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.JournalEntry.nfEDSQG0DMBs7eGp]{Weapons}: @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.JournalEntry.nfEDSQG0DMBs7eGp.JournalEntryPage.0OO6dvVBUM4XAluS]{Simple Weapons}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.95GGJe2TrPOBeRIU]{Hand Crossbows}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.ZOyejSDAVAH74Z4u]{Longswords}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.poEXwYP4n9HdRzwm]{Rapiers}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.0hIX4VFLMTXWVYoW]{Shortswords}

@UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.JournalEntry.SySQiDfSWcSRUCFN]{Tools}: three @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.SySQiDfSWcSRUCFN.JournalEntryPage.wuMEnZz82yY02Dok#musical-instrument]{Musical Instruments} of your choice

Saving Throws: &Reference[Wisdom], &Reference[Charisma]

@UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.JournalEntry.rv19GFzEa0nMTuAF]{Skill Proficiencies}: Performance and three of your choice

Items

You start with the following equipment, in addition to the equipment granted by your background:

  • a @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.poEXwYP4n9HdRzwm]{rapier} -OR- a @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.ZOyejSDAVAH74Z4u]{longsword}
  • any @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.JournalEntry.nfEDSQG0DMBs7eGp.JournalEntryPage.0OO6dvVBUM4XAluS]{Simple Weapon} -OR- a @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.OE836KUoJiAsG0IA]{small shield}
  • three @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.SySQiDfSWcSRUCFN.JournalEntryPage.wuMEnZz82yY02Dok#musical-instrument]{Musical Instruments}
  • @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.jSi9ralAm7FzUQbH]{padded armor} and a @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Y6IT6GdS7C81Yz02]{dagger}
  • a @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.d3IPRk1kOVorUKAt]{backpack} containing: 1 @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.ebJEn5hDnbW0vrXX]{bedroll}, 1 set of @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.XHohu6pK88RYQoQH]{fine clothes}, 5 @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.5oOvTa1KvKljuJ3G]{rations}, 1 @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.9IHclHKLZ072kDBB]{rope}, 1 @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.Jl3sEGCd3el0bGdm]{tinderbox}, 5 @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.pULRx2Zi5CWcbI59]{torches}, 1 @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.Item.JZErJp3ktez5s90X]{waterskin} containing 5 pints of water

Multiclass Characters

Instead of leveling up in your original class, you can take a bard level when you level up. When you do, you gain only a portion of what first level bards gain.

Multiclassing Ability Score Requirements

Taking levels in several classes requires exceptional ability. You must meet the multiclassing ability score requirements for both your original class and the class you are multiclassing into.

For bards you must have:

  • Charisma: 14

Hit Points

Per Level: 1d8 (or 5) + Constitution Modifier
Hit Dice: 1d8 per bard level

Proficiencies

@UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.JournalEntry.q10XUuFrVlw8qYj1]{Armor}: @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.JournalEntry.q10XUuFrVlw8qYj1.JournalEntryPage.4ZoOlPhNDk46Vvnr]{Light Armor}

@UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.JournalEntry.nfEDSQG0DMBs7eGp]{Weapons}: @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.JournalEntry.nfEDSQG0DMBs7eGp.JournalEntryPage.0OO6dvVBUM4XAluS]{Simple Weapons}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.95GGJe2TrPOBeRIU]{Hand Crossbows}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.ZOyejSDAVAH74Z4u]{Longswords}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.poEXwYP4n9HdRzwm]{Rapiers}, @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-equipment.0hIX4VFLMTXWVYoW]{Shortswords}

@UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.JournalEntry.SySQiDfSWcSRUCFN]{Tools}: three @UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.SySQiDfSWcSRUCFN.JournalEntryPage.wuMEnZz82yY02Dok#musical-instrument]{Musical Instruments} of your choice

@UUID[Compendium.elkan5e.elkan5e-rules.JournalEntry.rv19GFzEa0nMTuAF]{Skills}: two of your choice (one of which must be performance if you don't have it)

Bard Advancement

advancement.title: Magical Secrets
advancement.hint: You now choose two more spells from the bard, cleric, druid, sorcerer, warlock, or wizard spell lists​. The spells can be from different classes, but this time they must be a cantrip or a spell of 3rd level or lower, as opposed to the previous limit of 1st level. The chosen spells count as bard spells for you, and they count as extra known spells, meaning they don't count against the number of spells you know. You can exchange a spell learned from Magical Secrets when you level up, like with other spells.

advancement.title: Improved Magical Secrets
advancement.hint: You now choose two more spells from the bard, cleric, druid, sorcerer, warlock, or wizard spell lists​. The spells can be from different classes, but this time they must be a cantrip or a spell of 5th level or lower, as opposed to the previous limit of 3rd level. The chosen spells count as bard spells for you, and they count as extra known spells, meaning they don't count against the number of spells you know. You can exchange a spell learned from Magical Secrets when you level up, like with other spells.

advancement.title: Greater Magical Secrets
advancement.hint: You now choose two more spells from the bard, cleric, druid, sorcerer, warlock, or wizard spell lists​. The spells can be from different classes, but this time they must be a cantrip or a spell of 7th level or lower, as opposed to the previous limit of 5th level. The chosen spells count as bard spells for you, and they count as extra known spells, meaning they don't count against the number of spells you know.

advancement.title: Spell Choice
advancement.hint: This list only shows 2nd level spells. If you want to pick a lower level spell, you can drag-drop the spell from the Elkan 5e Spells compendium

advancement.title: Spell Choice
advancement.hint: This list only shows 3rd level spells. If you want to pick a lower level spell, you can drag-drop the spell from the Elkan 5e Spells compendium

advancement.title: Spell Choice
advancement.hint: This list only shows 4th level spells. If you want to pick a lower level spell, you can drag-drop the spell from the Elkan 5e Spells compendium

advancement.title: Spell Choice
advancement.hint: This list only shows 5th level spells. If you want to pick a lower level spell, you can drag-drop the spell from the Elkan 5e Spells compendium

advancement.title: Spell Choice
advancement.hint: This list only shows 6th level spells. If you want to pick a lower level spell, you can drag-drop the spell from the Elkan 5e Spells compendium

advancement.title: Spell Choice
advancement.hint: This list only shows 7th level spells. If you want to pick a lower level spell, you can drag-drop the spell from the Elkan 5e Spells compendium

advancement.title: Spell Choice
advancement.hint: This list only shows 8th level spells. If you want to pick a lower level spell, you can drag-drop the spell from the Elkan 5e Spells compendium

advancement.title: Spell Choice
advancement.hint: This list only shows 9th level spells. If you want to pick a lower level spell, you can drag-drop the spell from the Elkan 5e Spells compendium

advancement.title: Note on Bard Colleges
advancement.hint: If your chosen Bard College has a level 10 feature, you can ignore this message. Most bard colleges that aren't made for Elkan 5e rules don't have a level 10 feature, so if that applies to you, you can instead choose a feat at this level. You'll need to add the feat manually.

advancement.title: Item
advancement.hint: a rapier -OR- a longsword

advancement.title: Item
advancement.hint: any Simple Weapon -OR- a small shield

advancement.title: Item
advancement.hint: three Musical Instruments

advancement.title: Superior Ability
advancement.hint: You increase one ability score of your choice by 2, to a maximum of 22.

advancement.title: Feat
advancement.hint:
At this level and every level you gain an ability score improvement, you also gain a feat of your choice. You are eligible for general feats and bard feats by default.
                        You may be eligible for other feats, which you can drag from the appropriate compendium into this box below.
                        
                        Some feats have additional prerequisites. Check the description of a feat before choosing it.

advancement.title: Bard College
advancement.hint:
Your choice of bard college represents which advanced techniques you learned to control the magic of language, performance, or sound. Your choice grants you features at 3rd level and again at 6th, 10th, and 14th level.
    
    
    
    Bard Colleges published elsewhere are compatible with this version of the bard class. For help converting a subclass to function with Elkan 5e, see the Elkan 5e Rules Compendium -> Help.

advancement.title: Feat
advancement.hint: You gain a level 1 feat of your choice. You can choose from the feats available to all classes or choose a level 1 class-specific feat, if there is one available.

advancement.title: Magical Secrets
advancement.hint: You have learned magical knowledge from a wide spectrum of disciplines. Choose two cantrips or 1st level spells from the bard, cleric, druid, sorcerer, warlock, or wizard spell lists. The spells can be from different classes. The chosen spells count as bard spells for you, and they count as extra known spells, meaning they don't count against the number of spells you know. You can exchange a spell learned from Magical Secrets when you level up, like with other spells.
